description: TextMate bundles used for language support can be used for enabling syntax highlighting, tab triggers, code completion, and hotkey shortcuts.

Several TMBUNDLE files are included with the TextMate installation. They are located in the application bundle file within the /​Contents/​Shared Support/​Bundles/​ directory. New bundles can be created using the Bundle Editor, which can be opened by selecting Bundles → Bundle Editor → Show Bundle Editor in the software.
